content.question: A toy bus moving on the same table has the same position given by (x(t),y(t)) . Here, x(t) is the function found in part (a), and y(t)=2+12 sin (t/4) is the distance from the bus to the train track, in centimeters. Write, but do not evaluate, an integral equation that gives the total distance traveled by the bus during the time interval 0≤t≤4 .

frqParts.text: A toy bus moving on the same table has the same position given by (x(t),y(t)) . Here, x(t) is the function found in part (a), and y(t)=2+12 sin (t/4) is the distance from the bus to the train track, in centimeters. Write, but do not evaluate, an integral equation that gives the total distance traveled by the bus during the time interval 0≤t≤4 .

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

topic.text: 9.6: (BC ONLY) Solving Motion Problems Using Parametric and Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
